trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that handles the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示處理 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting" /> 控制項之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>事件時插入按鈕 (按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為 「 插入 」) 控制項內按一下時前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項才會插入記錄。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as HTML-encoding the values of a record before inserting it in the data source, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如 HTML 編碼的事件處理常式插入資料來源中，每當發生此事件之前記錄的值。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventHandler>委派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventHandler> delegate to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewInsertEventHandler>委派給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.ItemInserting>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制項。
